column4: Would it present any problems for me to set /home on a different drive than / ?
actually, that's a very good idea.  I wish I'd done that when I installed the system.
you probably _should_ make /home have its own partition. Wether it's on the same drive or another, is of no concern.
all right, thanks. I remember hearing that certain mount points shouldn't be in separate partitions/drives, I don't recall which atm though.
